# netbird_dns_zone (Resource)

Create and manage custom DNS zones. See [NetBird Docs](https://docs.netbird.io/how-to/manage-dns-in-your-network) for more information.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "netbird_dns_zone" "example" {
  name                 = "example-zone"
  domain               = "example.local"
  enabled              = true
  enable_search_domain = false
  distribution_groups  = []
}

# DNS Zone with distribution groups
resource "netbird_dns_zone" "internal" {
  name                 = "internal-zone"
  domain               = "internal.company.com"
  enabled              = true
  enable_search_domain = true
  distribution_groups  = [netbird_group.dev.id, netbird_group.ops.id]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `domain` (String) Zone domain (FQDN)
- `name` (String) DNS Zone name identifier

### Optional

- `distribution_groups` (Set of String) Group IDs that define groups of peers that will resolve this zone
- `enable_search_domain` (Boolean) Enable this zone as a search domain
- `enabled` (Boolean) DNS Zone status

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) DNS Zone ID
